subject: CMS
chunk_text:
UNIT 10 Joomla
Ms. Shruthi Nair
Assistant Professor
St. Xavier’s College, 
Mapusa-Goa

●
Joomla is an open source Content Management System (CMS), which is used 
to build websites and online applications. 
●
It is free and extendable which is separated into front-end and back-end 
templates (administrator). 
●
Joomla is developed using PHP, Object Oriented Programming, software 
design patterns and MySQL (used for storing the data).
Introduction

●
Joomla is based on Mambo CMS which was developed by an Australian 
company in 2001 and initially released on August 17, 2005. 
●
The official version of Joomla 1.0 was released on September 22, 2005.
History

Features
